info.title: Rosé Patcher
info.author: Project Rosé Team
info.description: This is Rosé Patcher! The Aroma plugin that revives Nintendo TVii icon from the Wii U Menu and Home Menu, as well as the applet from inside!
info.details:
This plugin restores the Nintendo TVii app icon on both the HBM and Wii U Menu, it also patches the app to use the Project Rosé revival.

As of the time of release, the service is currently not available, and the app will display a screen saying this, eventually the app will be released and it will be functional again! For more information, check the Discord server linked in our website (projectrose.cafe)

Extras:
- Adds support for reminders (Aroma notifications, W.I.P)

changelog: - Adds country code to token.\n- adds paid dlc
